Description.Text: The Leo Apartments are a small, family run complex set in attractive gardens in a peaceful area of Puerto de Pollensa. These comfortable, well maintained apartments have one or two bedrooms and well equipped kitchens. There are only 25 apartments in nine small blocks set in the gardens with two adult swimming pools, one childrens pool, sun terraces, sunbeds and umbrellas. You will love the friendly, relaxed atmosphere. The complex is just 700 metres from the long, sandy beach of Puerto de Pollensa, and the same distance from the town centre. This is one of the most scenic areas on the island and the Leo Apartments make the perfect holiday base! Keys will be in the entrance lounge on arrival.
